pilot_flying: Advance thrust levers to approximately 40% N1.
Observe engine instruments stabilized and normal.
pilot_not_flying: Observe engine instruments stabilized and normal.
both: Observe engine instruments stabilized and normal.

pilot_flying: Push either TO/GA switch to advance the thrust levers to takeoff N1.

pilot_not_flying: Ensure thrust levers advance to takeoff N1. Observe mode annunciation. Note: In strong headwinds thrust levers may not reach full N1; manually advance as required.

pilot_flying: Note: Captain’s hand must remain on thrust levers until V1.
pilot_not_flying: Note: Captain’s hand must remain on thrust levers until V1.

pilot_flying: Hold light forward pressure on control column; maintain directional control.
pilot_not_flying: Monitor engine instruments. Verify oil pressure is not in amber band.
Call '80 KNOTS.' Verify A/T annunciation changes to THR HLD by 84 knots.

pilot_flying: Monitor airspeed, noting V1, and rotate smoothly at VR.
pilot_not_flying: [Automatic V1 callout] Confirm automatic V1 callout or call 'V1'. At VR call 'ROTATE'. Monitor flight instruments.

pilot_flying: Call 'GEAR UP' and continue rotation to takeoff pitch attitude.
pilot_not_flying: Verify positive rate of climb. Position landing gear lever UP.

pilot_flying: When a positive rate of climb isindicated, call “GEAR UP” andcontinue rotation to takeoff pitchattitude.
